name: Pradhan Mantri Kisan Samman Nidhi (PM-KISAN)
eligibility: Small and marginal farmers owning up to 2 hectares of cultivable land.

name: Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana (PMAY)
eligibility: Economically weaker households, low-income groups, and beneficiaries without pucca houses.
benefits: Subsidized home loans & financial support for house construction.

name: Ayushman Bharat - PMJAY
eligibility: Economically vulnerable families as per SECC data.

name: Stand-Up India Scheme
eligibility: SC/ST and women entrepreneurs aged 18+ with a viable business idea.

name: National Scholarship Portal (NSP)
eligibility: Students from Class 1 to PhD; income-based restrictions apply.
benefits: Scholarships for school, college, and higher education.

name: Gruha Lakshmi Scheme
eligibility: Women heads of household in Karnataka.

name: Kalaignar Magalir Urimai Thogai
eligibility: Women aged 21+ from eligible families in Tamil Nadu.

name: Tamil Nadu Chief Minister’s Breakfast Scheme
Telangana Rythu Bandhu Scheme
benefits: ₹5,000 per acre per season financial support.

name: Aasara Pension Scheme
eligibility: Senior citizens, widows, disabled persons, and weavers in Telangana.
benefits: Monthly pension amounts vary by category.
